org.springdata.cassandra.mapping

Interface CassandraPersistentProperty

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.mapping.PersistentProperty<CassandraPersistentProperty>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicCassandraPersistentProperty, CachingCassandraPersistentProperty

    public interface CassandraPersistentProperty
extends org.springframework.data.mapping.PersistentProperty<CassandraPersistentProperty>
    Cassandra specific PersistentProperty extension.
    Author:
    Alex Shvid

    • Property Summary

      • Properties inherited from interface org.springframework.data.mapping.PersistentProperty

        isIdProperty, isVersionProperty

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  CassandraPersistentProperty.PropertyToColumnNameConverter
      Simple Converter implementation to transform a CassandraPersistentProperty into its column name.

      String getColumnName()
      Returns the name of the field a property is persisted to.

      Returns the data type.

      Returns index name for the column.

      Returns keyPart if the property has KeyColumn annotation.

      Returns ordering for the column.
      Integer getOrdinal()
      Returns key ordinal, number of the property in the composite primary key.

      Returns the true if the field has embedded type.
      boolean isEnum()
      Returns true for enum types
      boolean isIndexed()
      Returns true if the property has index on this column.
